service.name: Outbound CCR to Fax Service
service.visible: A new selection appears on the yellow sticky inside the MedCommons Viewer
service.comment: There are no prerequisites for this module
service.explanation: Allows you to send faxes to your healthcare providers directly from your MedCommons Account
service.charges: There will be a setup fee and a per page fee
service.technical: The CCR is rendered according to a variation of the ASTM standard stylesheet. There will be an opportunity for the user to specify the quality and the sections she wishes to transfer.
